name: Dictator Simulator
description:
Welcome, dear leader, your people await!

You have successfuly taken power against the evil

forces and are now ready to lead your country to

greatness. But to do so, you must remain in power as

long as possible, and nothing can get in the way. You

will have to fight the unworthy rebellious ones by

buying troops. You will also need to promote yourself

through propaganda to gain to cut the rebel's

recruiting. You will raise taxes to fight, even at the

cost of some popularity. The choices that you will

make will show if you are truly great.

Good luck, marvellous leader!
